div.p: There was a very specific moment in my life where I thought gosh this is going the wrong way, this is just ending up
I’m going to be just like these people around me and that really scared me; I was 19 at the time and I packed my bags and I left where I was living,
I told my mum goodbye and off I went to start afresh.
You know I didn’t have very proactive parents, I think they were quite absent parents but life provides you with mentors around every corner
and I think we just have to look out for them so it’s either a teacher who believes in you or somebody that you meet
that kind of helps you a little step, I don’t think we can achieve anything on our own you know we constantly have
so my boss is probably my most influential mentor to date in my life and that’s great.
